name: Pyrolusite's Resource Packs
tagline: Repository containing everything related to my resource packs for Minecraft and various mods.
body:
# Important information
Since I'm currently experimenting, this page is a work-in-progress.
Notifications on Twitter and my main forum thread about this will happen once finished.

# Vanilla Resource Packs
### Vanilla : Another Overworld
-WIP-

### HUD only, various mod support : Modern Minimalism
-WIP-

# Mods Resource Packs
### GT5/GT6 + IC2 : Minimalist Technology
-WIP-

# License
All these resource packs are under a [Creative Commons License - Attribution, Non Commercial, Share Alike 4.0 International -](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en) which means you can do whatever you want with it as long as you do not make money from it, credit me when using my work for whatever purpose and use the same license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
